sections.heading: bridge; construction bonds authorized
sections.text: Any county, township, precinct, city or village in the State of Nebraska may issue bonds to construct or to aid in the construction of a highway bridge across any boundary river of the state.SourceLaws 1895, c. 45, ยง 1, p. 187;R.S.1913, ยง 2996;C.S.1922, ยง 2748;C
